channel.title: [REL] Kedonot1 Shop Maker V1
channel.description:
Intro: Hi, i made my first server tool. Shop maker :D
It just makes the shops for you! :)
Pic: [img]http://kedonot1scape.no-ip.info/maker.png[/img]
Coming soon?
Server tools v2
What it will contain?
Run Server Compile Server Shop Maker AutoSpawn Maker and anything else someone requests.
------Waring---- I forgot to code it so it makes a new line ^^ So, it only makes 1 at a time atm. Sorry guys, its 9:50pm and im too tired to work on it.
----Not anything in client.java that doesnt work unless you copy and paste------ Have fun :)
[url=http://kedonot1scape.no-ip.info/shop maker.rar]http://kedonot1scape.no-ip.info/shop maker.rar[/url]

item.title: [REL] Kedonot1 Shop Maker V1
item.dc:creator: @kedonot1 kedonot1
item.description:
@kedonot1 wrote:

[quote=“wolfs goal, post:10, topic:250967”][quote author=kedonot1 link=topic=331134.msg2585595#msg2585595 date=1229482982]

hmmm…i might release my java writer…

heres an example

public void: multiattack

explains: spellId

explains: range of attack

explains: npc or player

player must be in wild: yes

npc must be in wild: no

affects players outside of wild: no

affects npc’s outside of wild: yes

affects npc’s inside wild: yes

affects players inside wild: public void wildylevel

effects caster: no

[generate]

basically this is my java coder for making voids for spells and npc’s using mage

it does work, i have 5 different types.

but until then

hi popple

i can generate of all of thoses too.
It’s easy,
just though
You need couple different texts files which are easy.
but it will equal to big space. And bull shit,
Ill start adding images and ect.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 16, 2008, 09:03:51 pm[/size][hr][quote author=heroisgay link=topic=331134.msg2585591#msg2585591 date=1229482938]
Or people could learn how to write java themselves.
[/quote]
People lazy,
They anit going to do it.
And i been trying to find one of these, so i made one.
And i said ( why no release to moparscape? )
Hopefully you guys like it.
Im deciding to the good comments ill make a HUGE Pack.

[/quote]

i made this for myself, when i was 9…

when i was 9 i was writing java coding…

even though i never understood it

so i made the java writer to help me[/quote]

Java writer?
Never heard of that.
On Track,
Im 12 xD

Read full topic
